title: Harlequin romances - March 2014 releases (Epub)
description:
Harlequin romances - March 2014 releases (Epub)


Carole Mortimer - A Prize Beyond Jewels 

Risking it all? 

World-renowned gallery owner Rafe D'Angelo has firm boundaries for his romantic conquests and is notorious for leaving ladies wanting more. Which is why it's such a shock to wake and findÃ¢â‚¬â€for the first time everÃ¢â‚¬â€the sheets beside him coldÃ¢â‚¬Â¦. 

Nina Palitov's only act of defiance against a life lived under her father's oppressive control was to spend an exquisite night with Rafe. But Nina should have known that this D'Angelo relishes a challenge. His pursuit of her provokes a passion she's never experienced before, but with her family's deepest secret at risk, it's essential she doesn't become Rafe's latest prize!

Cathy Williams - Enthralled by Moretti

You win, Alessandro." 

Defeat leaves a bitter taste in lawyer Chase Evans's mouth. She's worked hard to put the mistakes of her past behind her but it's not in billionaire CEO Alessandro Moretti's nature to forgiveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦or forget. And in this latest deal, he holds all the cards. 

Despite her lies, Alessandro wants the elusive Chase in his bed now more than ever, and he's not above blackmail to get her there. But his punishing regime of red-hot revenge backfires as his increasing desire for Chase threatens his legendary self-control, and still, Chase and her secrets seem just out of his reachÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

Maisey Yates - Pretender to the Throne 

A duty to the pastÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 

After fifteen years in self-imposed exile, the haunted rebel prince Xander Drakos must walk back through the palace gates and assume the role he once abandoned. 

Only one woman can restore his good nameÃ¢â‚¬â€the woman he left behind. But when Xander finds Layna Xenakos, he's horrified to see the effects of the turmoil he left behind written in the scars across her body. 

But her scars have given her strength, and Layna refuses to bow to his royal command. Now Xander must use his practiced charm to convince her to become his bride, securing his legitimate place on the throne.

Victoria Parker - The Woman Sent to Tame Him 

Resistance is futile! 

Serena Scott knows that Finn St. George is trouble with a capital T. Gorgeous? Yes. World-class racing driver? Yes. Shameless lothario bent on self-destruction? Definitely! But Finn has finally caused one scandal too manyÃ¢â‚¬â€and Serena is charged with getting him back on track! 

Finn loves his playboy lifestyle; after all, immersing oneself in beautiful women is much more pleasurable than raking over the bitter truths of the past. Serena's unheard-ofÃ¢â‚¬â€and infuriatingÃ¢â‚¬â€resistance to his charms begins a battle of wills. Can she tame this bad boy, or will Serena become entangled in the sensual power of his hedonistic temptation?

Kate Hewitt - A Queen for the Taking

Innocent in the king's bedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 

Spare to the throne, Alessandro Diomedi never expected to be dragged back to Maldinia and thrust beneath the crown. Upheaval has ravaged his country, but one thing has stayed the same: the woman he must now marry. 

Trained from birth to be the perfect queen, it's finally time for Liana Aterno to do her duty. But Sandro is not the man she remembers. Cynical and brooding King Sandro unexpectedly ignites a fire in her that sparks rebellion! 

When their first electrifying kiss nearly proves both their undoing, Sandro is determined to unleash all the passion his mysterious queen has learned to hide so well!

Lindsay Armstrong - An Exception to His Rule

Never, ever, date the boss 

Mining millionaire Damien Wyatt lives by one rule: never more than one night. But when Harriet Livingstone appears across an interview tableÃ¢â‚¬â€the same woman who totaled his sports car!Ã¢â‚¬â€he's tempted by her stunning beauty. So he steals a kiss and she wipes the smile from his face with a well-delivered slap! 

Harriet Livingstone wouldn't take the job if she weren't desperateÃ¢â‚¬â€the last thing she wants is to get involved with the attractive yet arrogant Damien! But keeping their relationship out of the bedroom is becoming a battleÃ¢â‚¬Â¦one neither of them really wants to win.

Michelle Smart - What a Sicilian Husband Wants

On his terms only! 

Moving countries, cutting all ties and giving birth to her baby alone, Grace Holden is desperately hiding from her past. But just when she thinks she might have broken free, it catches up with her in the form of her millionaire Sicilian husband! 

Grace swore her daughter wouldn't grow up among the dark power and money of his familyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦but no one walks away from Luca Mastrangelo. Now, back within his reach, Grace is surprised to see new depths to the man she married, and each crack in his armor makes it harder to fight the desire still blazing between them.

Jennie Lucas - The Sheikh's Last Seduction

Famous last wordsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 

When Sheikh Sharif offers Irene Taylor more money as chaperone to his sister than she's ever made before, she can't refuseÃ¢â‚¬â€finally she'll safeguard her family. Irene may be innocent, but she knows the trail of destruction playboys like Sharif leave behind, and will resist his skilled seductionÃ¢â‚¬Â¦. 

Sharif excels at everything he doesÃ¢â‚¬â€especially in the bedroom! His engagement hasn't yet been announced and he'll enjoy his freedom until then. Starting with the beguiling IreneÃ¢â‚¬â€she's the ideal final challenge before he embarks on a life of duty. 

But sometimes even the plans of a sheikh go awry!

Format: EPUB
